page.title: 15SCHOOL DAYS
page.content: The best time in school is christmas and easter. Every year we sing songs for old people and they enjoy it very much. A few weeks before Christmas we do songs and plays. In 1984 we did a play called The Snow Queen. My friends Cleo, Julia and Paula were in it. Cleo robber and looked nice in red and black. Julia played a crow and didn't have to sy anything. She was dressed in a black suit with a bright yellow beak. When she came on stage everyone laughed because she lpooked funny. Paula played the Snow Queen> she wore a beautiful white dress and a gold and white crown. en there is nothing special going on in school the best day is Thursday because go swimming straight after play.
